sub_title: Chinese Student Association - Erasmus University Rotterdam
summary:
CSA-EUR is a formal student organization at the Erasmus University of Rotterdam, one of the top universities in Europe. One of its biggest faculties is the Rotterdam School of Management, with a ranking among the top 30 of business schools all around the world (Financial Times).

CSA-EUR stands for the Chinese Student Association Erasmus University Rotterdam. It is a student association that interacts with those that share the same interests in Chinese culture or business. Acting as a window between China and the Netherlands, the Chinese Student Association brings multiple cultures and talents together.

CSA-EUR is always open for new partners, sponsors and cooperations. Please, send an email to external@csa-eur.nl.

鹿特丹伊拉斯莫斯大学是一所在欧洲排名居前的大学，属于它的一个专业系－ 鹿特丹商务管理学院，是位居世界排名前30的商务学院 （Financial Times)。

CSA-EUR 是一个在鹿特丹伊拉斯莫斯大学成立的华人学生会。我们的华人学生会是为所有来自不同地方，却同时都对中国的文化或者经济感兴趣的朋友们而建立的。我们的组织把不同的文化和天分聚集在一起，就像是一扇连接中国与荷兰的窗，为中西两方开启友好的交流。

projects.title: Study-trip to China 2014
projects.description:
Every year, the Chinese Student Association (CSA-EUR) organizes a Study Trip to China. The IR committee consist out of Billy Shen, Kachu Man, Lena Chou,  Pu Xie & Yung-Long Hu.

In 2014 the students went to Shanghai. Students visited the Dutch-consulate, ABInBev, ALIBABA, Carrefour & Rabobank.

projects.title: Study-trip to China 2019
projects.description:
In 2019, the study trip committee took place from the 26th of April till the 8th of May. They traveled to the metropolis cities: Shanghai, Suzhou, and Chengdu. Participants could discover how multinational businesses are operating China, visit prestigious universities, and experience the exciting culture with local engagement.

The responsibility of the committee was to plan, budget, organize, and execute their itinerary. Other duties were the acquisition of sponsors & promotion.

projects.title: China in Focus 2019
projects.description:
The 15th edition of the China In Focus Career Days was about “Entering the Digital Silk Road,”; a metaphor for the interconnectivity between the Netherlands, China, and the rest of the world in general. Students had the opportunity to connect with companies such as Alibaba, Achmea, Booking.com, Huawei, KLM, Rabobank, and more. 

The responsible committee took care of contacting guest-speakers, promotion, arranging the facility, organing the workshops, selecting participants, and sponsorship acquisition.

projects.title: Study-trip to China 2018
projects.description:
In 2018, the study trip committee was excited to announce that they were going to Beijing, China's cultural and political capital alongside with Chengdu, notorious for being home to the giant pandas and its Szechuan cuisine. Over the course of ten days, participants were able to explore China’s rich culture and experience its business ways. This includes visits to multinational companies and the top universities, as well as taking part in cultural activities.

The responsibility of the committee was to plan, budget, organize, and execute their itinerary. Other duties were the acquisition of sponsoring & promotion.

projects.title: China in Focus 2018
projects.description:
In celebration of the Chinese New Year, CSA-EUR presents China In Focus, the 14th edition of our annual business symposium on the 13th and 14th of February 2018. As China is playing an increasingly important role in the global economy, China In Focus is an outstanding manner for you to gain more knowledge on recent developments in the Chinese business sphere. Keynote speakers were Jan Peter Balkenende & Lulu Wang, Frank Weijen & Wouter Jacobs.

The responsible committee took care of contacting guest-speakers, promotion, arranging the facility, and organing the workshops.

projects.description:
In 2017, the study trip committee was thrilled to announce that they were going to China’s capital Beijing, and it’s the most populated city, Shanghai. During the trip, they visited top universities and companies to get to know more about China and how the country has gotten to where it is today.

The responsibility of the committee was to plan, budget, organize, and execute their itinerary. Other duties were the acquisition of sponsoring & promotion.

profile_positions.company: CSA-EUR: Chinese Student Association Erasmus University Rotterdam
profile_positions.description:
Get ready to experience one of the world's richest breadth of culture and impressive ancient heritage. Discover how multinational businesses are operating China, visit prestigious universities and experience the exciting culture with local engagement. Explore the possibilities that China has to offer for your future. Join us on our journey to Beijing, Hangzhou, and Yunhe Rice Terraces!

Responsible for preparing, planning, budgeting & executing the yearly study-trip in 2020. Other responsibilities include: acquisition of sponsoring & promotion.
profile_positions.title: CSA-EUR - Study Trip 2020

profile_positions.company: CSA-EUR: Chinese Student Association Erasmus University Rotterdam
profile_positions.description:
CSA-EUR proudly announces China in Focus Career Days 2020 with as theme: “Startup Today, Unicorn Tomorrow”; a metaphor for the start-up landscape in China, which is rapidly growing in size and interest through technological innovations.

In celebration of Chinese New Year, we organize China in Focus Career Days 2020 to connect companies such as Achmea, Alibaba, Huawei, Rabobank, Tencent, PwC, and many more to our students. The China in Focus Career Days will be hosted on 29, 30 and 31 January in 2020, taking place at the Forumzaal Congress Floor and the Faculty Club of Erasmus University Rotterdam. 

WED 29 JAN 2020 - The grand opening will take place on Wednesday 29 January 2020, during the Business Congress. During the congress, specialists and inspiring speakers from Alibaba, Huawei, PwC, Tencent, Xiaomi and many more will be gathered to give inspiring presentations about the rapidly growing startup scene in China and its impact on the economy of tomorrow.

THURS 30 JAN 2020 - The second day is a recruitment day where students have the opportunity to solve cases and interact with companies such as Achmea, Grant Thornton, Huawei and Rabobank. On both days there will be networking opportunities during the networking lunches and coffee breaks. 

FRI 31 JAN 2020 - On Friday, our China in Focus Career Days will reach its climax on the off-campus In-house Day where selected participants will travel to Schiphol with KLM, to get an unique experience of working at the Operation Control Center. In addition, a look will be taken at the Flight Safety Simulation department and a workshop in Artificial Intelligence.

For more information, please visit our website csa-eur.nl/cif and subscribe to secure your spot. Registration will open up on the 4th of December.

Come to learn, to experience and to network.
profile_positions.title: China in Focus Career Days 2020

skills: Building Bridges between the East and West
